Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located in Crystal City / National Landing, 2451 Crystal Drive includes some of the best views of the Potomac River and DC's National Monuments. Minutes from Washington Reagan National Airport and abundant retail, dining and hotel options.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Plug & play space in great condition. Great views of Reagan Airport and DC. Fully furnished with high-end furniture. Flexible conference center configuration. Abundant parking at a reduced monthly rate.

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Virtually column-free full floor shell space with panoramic views of Washington DC, Iwo Jima Memorial and Georgetown. Willing to break for mid-sized tenants. Be a part of Rosslyn’s most exciting mixed-use residential, retail and commercial development. At 560,000 SF and 31 stories, Central Place is the tallest building in the Metro DC area, sitting on top of the Rosslyn Metro, with exciting new retail surrounding the project.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The spaces available at 2101 Wilson Boulevard are a mix of open area, conference rooms and offices, all creatively built with high-end finishes. There is an interconnecting stairwell between the 11th and 12th floors, which provides a potential user with 30,699 contiguous square feet for office use. This plug-and-play sublease has recently been built out and is an exceptional space minutes away from Metro access.

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Full floor available mid-2020. High end existing build out – interconnecting stairwell to 8th floor. Up to 73,317 SF large block available. 9-12’ ceiling heights and abundant natural light. Ballston Tower provides tenants with a fully covered sky-bridge to the Ballston metro platform, direct connection to the newly delivered Ballston Quarter and low cost parking in the 8-story Ballston Quarter parking garage, and very low core factor.
